title: Another Script Font?
content:
looks so simple but I can't find it... I think there are a BILLION fonts?

comments.content: I can't find an exact match. It could be a modified **[SignPainter (HouseSlant)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822180719/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries&ffam=&fid=ab8dc2a00a296dd44ec8ab0136c26dbf&fsize=48&text=DELL%20OR%20IT&fit=1)** by House Industries
